Ondaedes

Ondaedes is a startup that aims to track Aedes Aegypti's proliferation speed and potential risk to the population.

By considering temperature, weather, historical rain levels, soil coverage, urban constructions, and more, Ondaedes can indeed provide a powerful tool to predict where the cases will happen and plan your actions accordingly.

Together we developed the application to make this possible:

Dashboard

Take a look by yourself.

Or click here to visit Ondaedes' website.
